I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for a living?
I work in a bookstore! It's really fun, but I wish I could make it big in the music scene. Do you play any instruments?
I'm not great at it, but I've been learning the guitar for a while. I really want to perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends someday!
That's so cool! I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene. Maybe we can jam sometime!
That would be awesome! I've always wanted to play with someone else.
Great! I'm free on Saturday if you want to get together.
That sounds perfect! I'll send you my number so we can coordinate.
Awesome! I can't wait to meet you and jam!
